channel.title: ★ Universi ★ | Eco | 100% Uptime | Curses/Ancients | GE | All Skills | Overloads
channel.description:
Status: [FONT=Arial Black][B]Alpha[/B][/FONT]
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/CeW18Ox.png[/img]
Hello,
welcome to the adventure of Universi!
I am here to provide the best experience for my users, and to learn along the way. Our secondary objective is to provide a different Runescape experience. Universi is a 317 economy server loading 474 data. Come enjoy solid 100% bridding/PKing if you wish to make your fortune from your enemies corpses or enter the numerous boss caves to test your luck on epic loot. Come try us out, you won't regret it.
Forums: [URL=http://universi-eco.tk]universi-eco.tk[/URL]
Client: Mac: [url=http://universi-eco.tk/files/Universi-317.jar]http://universi-eco.tk/files/Universi-317.jar[/url] (Sometimes crashes due to low memory) Windows: [url=http://universi-eco.tk/files/Universi-317.exe]http://universi-eco.tk/files/Universi-317.exe[/url] (Allocates more memory)
(based on epicurus source)
Features: [I]- GRAND EXCHANGE - All skills! - Randomly get skill points while skilling and spend them! - Wilderness content - Crystal key chest (Halves from bosses) - VERY rare primal equipment and other items from VERY rare mystery boxes - Torva/virtus/pernix from very hard nomad - Curses - Ancients - Frost dragons - Tormented demons (100% Dragon claws) - Godswords - Corp beast - Dicing - Overloads/Extremes/Super Prayer - Easy barrows - Pest control - Duel Arena - Zombies - Warriors guild - Donator icons - PvP Point shop - Lots of reasons to skill and kill monsters - and more![/I]
[IMG]http://s2.postimg.org/kotdhuo8p/rsps9.png[/img]
[IMG]http://s4.postimg.org/4si6o29il/rsps8.png[/img]
[IMG]http://s17.postimg.org/aped9jkzz/rsps7.png[/img]
[IMG]http://s12.postimg.org/6m72ohwwd/rsps6.png[/img]
[img]http://s11.postimg.org/ie3fxiw8j/rsps1.png[/img]
[img]http://s11.postimg.org/fb7b7w6nn/rsps2.png[/img]
[img]http://s11.postimg.org/yf0mo8jhv/rsps3.png[/img]
[img]http://s11.postimg.org/msgin3w6r/rsps4.png[/img]
[img]http://s11.postimg.org/w91qfzqnn/rsps5.png[/img][/CENTER]

item.title: ★ Universi ★ | Eco | 100% Uptime | Curses/Ancients | GE | All Skills | Overloads
item.dc:creator: @yungtree yungtree
item.description:
@yungtree wrote:

Status: [FONT=Arial Black]Alpha[/FONT]

[CENTER]

Hello,

welcome to the adventure of Universi!

I am here to provide the best experience for my users, and to learn along the way. Our secondary objective is to provide a different Runescape experience. Universi is a 317 economy server loading 474 data. Come enjoy solid 100% bridding/PKing if you wish to make your fortune from your enemies corpses or enter the numerous boss caves to test your luck on epic loot. Come try us out, you won’t regret it.

Forums: universi-eco.tk

Client:
Mac: http://universi-eco.tk/files/Universi-317.jar (Sometimes crashes due to low memory)
Windows: http://universi-eco.tk/files/Universi-317.exe (Allocates more memory)

(based on epicurus source)

Features:
[I]- GRAND EXCHANGE

  • All skills!
  • Randomly get skill points while skilling and spend them!
  • Wilderness content
  • Crystal key chest (Halves from bosses)
  • VERY rare primal equipment and other items from VERY rare mystery boxes
  • Torva/virtus/pernix from very hard nomad
  • Curses
  • Ancients
  • Frost dragons
  • Tormented demons (100% Dragon claws)
  • Godswords
  • Corp beast
  • Dicing
  • Overloads/Extremes/Super Prayer
  • Easy barrows
  • Pest control
  • Duel Arena
  • Zombies
  • Warriors guild
  • Donator icons
  • PvP Point shop
  • Lots of reasons to skill and kill monsters
  • and more![/I]

[/CENTER]
